ValidationRule.description: Must enter a date in Ready to Audit and Payroll Verified first.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE( Setup_Complete_Date__c ) ) && NOT(ISBLANK(Setup_Complete_Date__c )) && OR(ISBLANK( Ready_to_Audit__c ),ISBLANK( Payroll_Verified__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a date in Ready to Audit and Payroll Verified first.
